idea:
The Caymus Technology Ventures' (CTV) vision is to transform access to quality education, broaden perspectives and optimize potential across the learning eco-system. Our goal is to build an education brand that offers differentiated thought leadership developed through scale and optimized outcomes.
 
Data and technology will underlie our strategy for two primary reasons: 1) to allow team members to develop relevant insights more effectively and efficiently, ultimately benefiting our client base; and 2) to allow the company to reach more stakeholders, even those for whom our personalized service price points are beyond reach. Ultimately, data and technology will allow CTV to deliver better outcomes across all customer segments.
Specific products and tools include those leveraging machine learning such as our patent-pending MBA program recommendation tool; artificial intelligence such as a proposed natural language processing enabled essay editing platform; automated curation and organization of high quality content such as our knowledge management system; and finally, an in-development platform that allows users to better understand post university lifelong learning options.
name: CAYMUS TECHNOLOGY VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Luminous Studio Entertainment is a Mumbai Production Company focused on innovative concepts with a fresh approach. The combined experience of the in-house team covers award-winning feature films, commercials, music videos, short films, live events, and new media content. The company consists of tluminous studiohree departments: Luminous Studio for live-action production, Luminous Studio, for post-production (editorial, visual effects), for original music and sound design.

idea:
UdderGo is an online platform where you can avail fresh milk and milk products. We strive to provide with the best quality products at your doorstep. Since milk is an important part of the Indian diet, so our primary mission is to make fresh and nutritious milk easily available to everyone.
UdderGo is focused on students living in hostels away from their homes. Quality milk is a rarity in these hostels. Consequently, they usually do not get the required amount of milk or even the prescribed nutrition. We, at UdderGo, took the responsibility of providing fresh quality milk to each and every individual. We do this by empowering small suppliers who we think provide the best quality products and deliver it to you.
Our mission is to make a positive impact on the communities around us and affect the lives of people in a positive way. Furthermore, we aim to take India from the largest milk-producing country to the country with the healthiest citizens (youth). Finally, select from a variety of products and make your day a happy one!
name: UdderGo

idea: Limen Leap Labs is a "software lab" that brings out very useful SaaS and Platforms. The founder is a trained as an architect from IIT Kharagpur; and he has the IPR for a unique early stage BIM (Building Information Modeling) software. See www.teamtad.com This software was used for the founder's various projects (including those of Konkan Railway) This is the main software that is being prompted. Now several new SaaS offerings are also in the offing, all emerging from the core expertise of software for the building Industry.
name: LIMEN LEAP LABS PRIVATE LIMITED
